title: AMC Recruitment 2025 - Walk - in for Senior Public Health Specialist Posts
description: The Amdavad Municipal Corporation (AMC) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Public Health Specialist Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application.
